comment: Digital approaches to data collection, management, analysis, storage. This can include standalone interventions focusing exclusively on data collection and management, as well as data services to support other interventions, such as data visualization within supply chain management.
Digital approaches to code data and manage the use of standardized datasets.
The use of geolocation coordinates to map objects and events.
The capability of two or more systems to communicate and exchange data through specified data formats and communication protocols.

en: Non routine data collection and management
synonyms: electronic data collection; digital data collection; mobile based surveys, using applications such as OpenDataKit (ODK), Enketo, FormHub, etc.
reporting dashboards; report generation;presentations of data;business intelligence

en: Automated analysis of data to generate new information or predictions on future events
Parse unstructured data into structured data
Merge, de-duplicate, and curate coded datasets or terminologies
synonyms: maintenance and versioning of health informatics terminology standards;terminology services;semantic interoperability

en: Classify disease codes or cause of mortality
synonyms: recording cause of death;ICD coding;clinical coding for reporting and insurance;mapping local terminology, codes, and formats

en: Map location of clients and households
synonyms: demarcation of catchment areas;mapping coverage areas;geospatial visualization;GPS mapping;mapping of health worker route to track the services provided
mapping of health worker route to track the services provided
data mediation;interoperability and accessibility;information exchange;interoperability layer;data orchestration
